mapper.select: select * from board ORDER BY REG_DATE DESC
mapper.update: update board set title = #{title}, detail = #{detail}, upt_date = sysdate where board_id = #{board_id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board (board_id, title, detail, writter, reg_date, upt_date) VALUES ('B00'||board_seq.nextval, #{title}, #{detail}, #{writter}, sysdate , NULL)
